content.prompt: The Peace of Westphalia also had which of the following effects on European politics?

choices.label: It weakened the Holy Roman Empire and caused the Habsburg dynasty to expand its territory eastward.
It encouraged the development of several new Protestant groups.
It caused a decline in the power of the Swedish monarchy.
It forced France and England into a defensive alliance with each other.

topic.text: 4.6: Enlightened and Other Approaches to Power

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
